articles.title: China's economic recovery diverges as factory output jumps and retail sales lag - Financial Times
articles.description: Beijing’s industrial policy is increasingly driving trade tensions with US and EU
articles.content: Chinas industrial production rose more than expected last month, but retail sales grew more slowly in a sign that weak consumer sentiment was weighing on a recovery in the worlds second-largest econo… [+3709 chars]

articles.author: Beth Mole, Ars Technica
articles.title: Wegovy Can Keep Weight Off for at Least 4 Years, Research Shows - WIRED
articles.description: Users receiving weekly injections saw their weight fall, plateau, and stabilize over the course of a four-year trial—but it’s still unclear how long these effects last after stopping taking the drug.
articles.content: A large, long-term trial of the weight-loss medication Wegovy (semaglutide) found that people tended to lose weight over the first 65 weeks on the drugabout one year and three monthsbut then hit a pl… [+3523 chars]

articles.title: I want Google's new scam detection in all of Android, not just during calls - Android Authority
articles.description: Google is taking a step towards preventing scams during phone calls, but our phones expose us to scams everywhere all the time. This should be system-wide.
articles.content: About once a week, I receive a message from my parents, my aunt, or some relative with a screenshot of what is to me some obvious spam or scam. To them, theres always a question mark. Could this be r… [+3362 chars]
